name: Sanito
shortDesp: Sanito leads our kitchen with passion, combining authentic Thai flavors with modern culinary artistry.
desp: As Head Chef, Sanito Sathip Sangwisit brings years of experience in Thai cuisine, crafting dishes that are both traditional and innovative. His dedication ensures every meal is a memorable experience.

name: Kanya
shortDesp: Kanya specializes in authentic Thai street flavors and spicy delicacies.
desp: Kanya brings her love for traditional Thai street food to the restaurant. She ensures that every dish bursts with authentic flavors and genuine Thai spices, delivering an unforgettable culinary journey.

name: Niran
shortDesp: Niran creates exquisite Thai-inspired desserts with elegance and flavor.
desp: Niran Chaiyaporn combines traditional Thai ingredients with contemporary pastry techniques to craft visually stunning and delicious desserts. Each creation is a work of art that complements our Thai menu perfectly.
